This code is difficult to make sense of quickly; A lot of repeated words like "Request" and "Builder" in the snippet makes it seem repetitive and a bit hard to find the API boundary between the two config classes. Perhaps it could be reworked to make it easier to read using the fluent methods?
RequestConfig requestConfig = RequestConfig.custom()
    .setConnectTimeout(5000)
    .setSocketTimeout(60000)
    .build();
RequestOptions options = RequestOptions.DEFAULT.toBuilder()
    .setRequestConfig(requestConfig)
    .build();
yeah, it's a good idea. thank you!
